about_the_game:
Overview:

Kiity is a playful and quirky feline, on his quest to gather fishes and unlock exciting items to furnish his cozy home. The game combines elements of skill, timing, and memory, making it perfect for casual players and cat enthusiasts alike.

Mechanics:

Collecting Fishes with the Wool Ball

Kiity's primary mission is to collect as many fishes as possible. Players control Kiity's favorite toy—a wool ball—to accomplish this. The objective is to guide the wool ball carefully through the level, aiming to pick up fishes scattered across the play area. However, there's a catch:

  • Don’t Drop the Wool Ball!
    The wool ball must stay in play at all times. If it falls or gets out of reach, Kiity becomes upset, and you’ll have to restart the level. Precision and patience are key to mastering this mechanic.

Special Wool Ball Colors on Kiity’s Belly

Kiity has a unique quirk: he carries a collection of colorful wool balls on his belly. Each wool ball represents a specific challenge and needs to be tapped or clicked in the correct sequence to keep Kiity happy.

  • Sequential Clicking Challenge
    The wool balls must be activated in a specific order. If you make a mistake, Kiity will react with a grumpy meow, as he dislikes having his belly scratched the wrong way.

  • Memory and Observation
    This feature adds an extra layer of challenge, requiring players to observe and remember the sequence before clicking. It's a delightful mix of strategy and reflexes.

Home Customization

As players help Kiity collect fishes and play with the wool ball, they unlock various rewards to decorate and improve Kiity's home. Players can unlock furniture, toys, and other decorations, creating a personalized space for Kiity. Doing all that Might unlock something secret and special ;)
